Package javelin.controller.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionDescription
    Describes an action.
    SimpleAction
    Basic description for an action that can be used both in and out of battle.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    One of the game moves, to be used during battle.
    ActionAdapter
    Used to create an in-battle Action from a WorldAction.
    ActionCost
    Utility class for more idyommatic access to different types of Combatant.ap costs.
    ActionMapping
    Basic listing of in-game Actions.
    AutoAttack  
    Breath
    Use BreathWeapons.
    Breath.BreathNode  
    CastSpell
    Spells with attack rolls are supposed to have critical hits too but for the sake of AI speed this rule is ignored.
    Charge
    Charging is a special full-round action that allows you to move up to twice your speed and attack.
    ConfigureBattleKeys  
    Defend
    Full Defense action.
    Dig  
    Examine
    Lets the player examine the surroundings and monsters.
    Fire
    Ranged attack.
    Help
    Shows keyboard commands.
    Movement  
    PassItem
    Hands item over to a friendly unit.
    TouchAttack
    An attack that reaches out only 5 feet, like from the Digester or Shocker Lizard.
    UseItem
    Activates an Item in battle.
    Withdraw
    Fless from battle at any time if not engaged.
    ZoomIn  
    ZoomOut
    TODO this should be a view feature in d20
